entry.def: If you describe the way that someone behaves as confrontational, you are showing your disapproval of the fact that they are aggressive and likely to cause an argument or dispute.

example.ex: The committee's confrontational style of campaigning has made it unpopular...
example.tran: 委员会咄咄逼人的宣传方式使其不得人心。

example.ex: Riot police are on hand but have not been confrontational.
example.tran: 防暴警察随时待命，但还没有出现冲突场面。
